author: Ima saver (julie is my real name)
title: coin jar
text: Ima Saver's Personal Finance Blog Trying to spend and save wisely About Me Ima saver (julie is my real name) I am over 70, but still feel like I am just 7. I love to go dancing with my wonderful husband of almost 38 years. Since we have never earned a lot of money, we have learned to take care of what we have. We live in the mountains in north georgia in a big beautiful house that my husband build and it is mortgage free. Now I am trying to save so my "younger" husband can retire someday. Categories
